plot: After Bob (Ray Mamrak), a local insurance salesman, living in Cape May, NJ loses his wife his daughter, Pepper (Olivia Albert), and his neighbor, Tina (Kristy Richman), try to get him back on his feet again.
title: Bob and Me
plot_es: After Bob (Ray Mamrak), a local insurance salesman, living in Cape May, NJ loses his wife his daughter, Pepper (Olivia Albert), and his neighbor, Tina (Kristy Richman), try to get him back on his feet again.
plot_en: After Bob (Ray Mamrak), a local insurance salesman, living in Cape May, NJ loses his wife his daughter, Pepper (Olivia Albert), and his neighbor, Tina (Kristy Richman), try to get him back on his feet again.
